title: Extent of change in role of the federal government

content.question:
Explain why and how the role of the federal government changed as a result of the Civil War with respect to TWO of the following during the period 1861–1877:

Race relations
Economic development
Westward expansion

frqParts.text:
Explain why and how the role of the federal government changed as a result of the Civil War with respect to TWO of the following during the period 1861–1877:

Race relations
Economic development
Westward expansion

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
